name: Blizzard Lumberjack
description:
A game where you play as a lumberjack escaping from a blizzard.

Make sure the body temperature won't go too low or high, or else you'll die.

You make a campfire by chopping down a tree, and when placed down, it will increase walking speed and body temperature. But make sure you don't stay near the campfire too long since you'll overheat.

Avoid walking into lakes, since they slow you down and lower your body temperature faster.

Also, there's a blizzard at the bottom which goes faster and faster, see how far you can get!

Controls:

'wasd' keys to move around,

Left mouse click to hit tree,

and Space to place down campfire

Music Used:

Happy Adventure (Loop)

By TinyWorlds

https://opengameart.org/content/happy-adventure-loop

Made for the Level Up Circle Game jam.
